channel.title: Events on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Events on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Maha Sivarathri Celebration
item.description: ========================================================================== To sponsor, you can visit the temple on the day of the event and sponsor as needed in-person or you can also use the *yellow* "Donate Now" button available on the webiste menu above. On the check-out screen on PayPal, enter your purpose as "Abishekam" or "Archanai" followed by the sponsorship-item. Example: "Maha Navarathri - All Four Jama Poosai" If you provide your email, phone and address, we will mail you the prasadam by postal-mail.
